response.overview: After a fire devastates her town, Beth drives home to help her father Charles in the aftermath of their family home burning down. Tensions emerge as they embark on the emotional process of assessing the losses of the disaster, revealing they are grieving in opposite ways. Will cumulative loss lead them to lose each other as well, or will Beth and Charles find their way back to each other, and to new growth, in the aftermath of trauma?
response.tagline: When a fire takes their home, a father and daughter must find a way to salvage what remains: each other.
response.title: Proof of Loss
